story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You’ve given me valuable insight into Hisui’s
unique style of battling.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It was developed as a way to deal with Pokémon
that were ruthlessly attacking people.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
One could say it was born from the need to
survive in harsh environments...
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I know one person who’d describe it that way,
at least.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Can you tell me more about him?
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: I’d say he’s an elusive person.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
He shows up out of nowhere to help or battle,
then vanishes in a flash.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: But there’s one thing I can say for sure...
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
He genuinely loves Pokémon, mythology, ruins,
and legends.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
He always seemed genuinely excited whenever we
explored ruins in Hisui...
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
and he was looking forward to the completion of
my Pokédex.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
A lot’s happened between us, but I don’t think he
was lying about those things.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I guess I’ll try to find out more about him the
next time we battle.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
So the reason you’re training so much is so you
can beat Volo?
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
But I also want Garchomp and I to outshine our
past selves.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
As Sinnoh Champions, and as a sync pair
here on Pasio...
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I want us to overcome anything that might be
holding us back!
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
That way, we can see how bright our lights
can shine!
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: Always aiming higher, even from the top, huh?
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: Well, I couldn't call myself a Champion if I didn’t.
story_arceus_01_01000/2401_1001_3200_10: People are in danger! We’ve got to go help them!
